text: Omonia (), is a Cypriot professional basketball club based in Nicosia, Cyprus. The club competes in Cyprus Basketball Division 2 for season 2016–17. The president of the team is Antonis Tzionis and the current manager is Nicolas Papadopoulos. ==History== Omonia BC was founded in 1948 from then the team participates regularly in the Cyprus Basketball Division 1. The team has never won neither a championship neither a cup. However, the team has sometimes finished first and second in the regular season of the Cyprus Basketball Division 1, it could not manage to proceed far and away from its opponents. ===Regular Season League Positions=== {| |width="5"| |valign="top"| {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="1"|Season !rowspan="1"|Position |- |align=centre|1991–1992 |align=centre|1st |- |align=centre|1992–1993 |align=centre|2nd |- |align=centre|1993–1994 |align=centre|2nd |- |align=centre|1994–1995 |align=centre|1st |- |align=centre|1997–1998 |align=centre|10th |- |align=centre|1998–1999 |align=centre|12th |- |align=centre|1999–2000 |align=centre|1st |- |align=centre|2000–2001 |align=centre|7th |} |width="5"| |valign="top"| {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="1"|Season !rowspan="1"|Position |- |align=centre|2001–2002 |align=centre|9th |- |align=centre|2002–2003 |align=centre|7th |- |align=centre|2003–2004 |align=centre|7th |- |align=centre|2004–2005 |align=centre|7th |- |align=centre|2005–2006 |align=centre|7th |- |align=centre|2006–2007 |align=centre|3rd |- |align=centre|2007–2008 |align=centre|5th |- |align=centre|2008–2009 |align=centre|9th |- |} |} ===Honors=== ;Cyprus Basketball Division B *Champions (3): 1988–89, 1993–94, 1999–00 ===European competitions=== *1995–96: Korać Cup *1996–97: Korać Cup ==Roster== {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- style="background- color: #007942; text-align: center; color: white;" | colspan="2" | Omonia B.C.
